POI.info: Drop down towards the bottom, and be careful.
POI.copy: Drop down to the bottom, careful you don't go splat on the ground.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop down, be careful' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: There's 2 Mastery Points along the way down. Can mark them for those who might need them.
POI.copy: There's 2 Mastery Points on the way as well, placing markers for those who might need them. Careful you don't drop past them if you need them.
POI.copy-message: '2 Mastery Points on the way, marking' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BN4HAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Shipwreck Peak Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those who don't have Bouncing Mushroom mastery.
POI.copy: Use the Bouncing Mushroom to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Use mushroom or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BN4HAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Shipwreck Peak Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those who don't have Bouncing Mushroom Mastery.
POI.copy: Use the Bouncing Mushroom to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Use mushroom or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those who don't have Skyscale or Springer to get up.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale or Springer to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Use Springer/Skyscale or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those who don't have a Skyscale.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale to follow me up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Use Skyscale or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Grab the waypoint before moving on.
POI.copy: Grab [&BAgIAAA=] before moving on, we'll TP back to it later.
POI.copy-message: 'Grab WP for later' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Drop down, HP is on a ledge.
POI.copy: Drop down, HP is on a ledge. Careful you don't miss it, or go splat on the ground.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop down, be careful' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BAgIAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Pact Encampment Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Drop down, HP is on a ledge.
POI.copy: Drop down, HP is on a ledge. It's a long drop, careful you don't miss it, or go splat on the ground.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop down, be careful' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BAgIAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Pact Encampment Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those who don't have Updraft Gliding mastery.
POI.copy: Use Updraft Gliding to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Use updraft or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here so gliding can be avoided. It's easy for beginners to miss the ledge to the HP.
POI.copy: Use a Skyscale to get around to the HP, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Carefully glide or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BO8HAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Faren's Flyer Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Careful moving across the tree vines.
POI.copy: Careful when moving across the tree vines, don't fall down here :)
POI.copy-message: 'Careful when moving across vines' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Extra Mastery Point if needed
POI.copy: Mastery Point here if you need it.
POI.copy-message: 'Mastery Point here if needed' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Drop down carefully, and watch out for the vines if you don't have Itzel Poison Lore.
POI.copy: Drop down here, and be careful you don't miss it or go splat on the ground. Don't touch the vines around the HP if you don't have Itzel Poison Lore mastery.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop down, careful, Poison Lore warning' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Those with Itzel Poison Lore can help clear enemies.
POI.copy: If you have Itzel Poison Lore mastery, you can help clear the enemies to make the area safe.
POI.copy-message: 'Help clear enemies if you have Poison Lore' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BO8HAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Faren's Flyer Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Final Hero Point, grab the waypoint first.
POI.copy: Final Hero Point, we'll grab [&BBwIAAA=] first before the HP :)
POI.copy-message: 'Final HP, grab WP first' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Res downed players, and respawn at nearby WP if you die.
POI.copy: Res any downed players - if you die, just respawn at [&BBwIAAA=] and come back quickly.
POI.copy-message: 'Res downed, respawn if dead' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BBwIAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Treacherous Path Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Drop down to the bottom.
POI.copy: Drop down to the bottom, careful you don't go splat on the ground.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop down, be careful' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: Take a piece of toxic bacon and use [&BhiEAAA=], then keep using [&BpqBAAA=] to heal. You can also help by spamming [&BhedAAA=]'s [&Bgm0AAA=] ability to provide barrier.
POI.copy-message: 'Eat Bacon, spam Jackal Pounce ability for barrier' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those who don't have Skyscale or Springer.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale or Springer to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Springer/Skyscale up, or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BNYHAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Wanderer's Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Grab waypoint before moving on.
POI.copy: Make sure you get [&BN0HAAA=] before moving on, we'll TP back to it later.
POI.copy-message: 'Grab waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Drop into the cave in center, take waypoint on the way.
POI.copy: Drop into the cave in the center. You can take [&BMYHAAA=] on the way if you need it.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop to cave in center, take WP on the way' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BN0HAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Northwatch Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without any of the masteries needed to get across. Use Mimic to quickly recharge portal.
POI.copy: Use Griffon, Skyscale, Ley-Line Gliding or other means to get across, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Use mounts or leyline glide or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale or Springer.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale or Springer to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Skyscale/Springer up, or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BN0HAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Northwatch Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale or Springer.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale or Springer to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Skyscale/Springer up or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Bouncing Mushroom or mounts.
POI.copy: Use Bouncing Mushroom or a mount to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Mushroom up or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Strongbox Mastery Point for those who need it.
POI.copy: Open the Strongbox for a Mastery Point if you don't have it already.
POI.copy-message: 'Strongbox mastery point' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Careful on the boss, stay away from the blue goop and CC fast.
POI.copy: Careful on this boss, the blue goop deals a lot of damage. Stay ranged if you can, and CC it quickly.
POI.copy-message: 'Careful of blue goop, CC quickly' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BEkIAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Chak Hollow Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale or Springer.
POI.copy: Skyscale/Springer up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Skyscale/Springer up or portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale or Springer.
POI.copy: Skyscale/Springer up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Skyscale/Springer up or portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those who don't have the Exalted Markings mastery.
POI.copy: Use the Exalted Mark to enter, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Use exalted mark or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: Balthazar is up, those with the mastery enter through the Exalted Mark, rest wait outside. Careful for the fire AoE, stay ranged if you can.
POI.copy-message: 'Balthazar event is up warning' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BEkIAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Chak Hollow Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BA4IAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Order of Whispers Camp Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Getting Teku Nuhoch Waypoint as it's close.
POI.copy: We're getting [&BAwIAAA=] as it's close by.
POI.copy-message: 'Geting nearby waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Use Skyscale or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those having trouble getting up, and use a Skyscale to quickly get up.
POI.copy: Wait here for a portal if you have trouble getting up.
POI.copy-message: 'Wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: If Rata Novus laser defences are active, put a portal here and sprint through with a Raptor or Jackal while invisible to portal the group safely through.
POI.copy: City defences are active, use [&BpnuAAA=] on a Jackal or Raptor to easily get through, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'City defences up, wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: City defences are active, follow me to stack up for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'City defences up, follow me' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here, and use a Skyscale to get up.
POI.copy: Use a Skyscale to follow me up, or stack here and wait for the portal!
POI.copy-message: 'Follow with Skyscale or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Careful on this boss, try and pull it out a bit and stay ranged if possible.
POI.copy: Careful on this boss, try and pull it out a bit and stay ranged if you can.
POI.copy-message: 'Careful on boss, stay ranged' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BAMIAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Rata Novus Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: Take the Exalted Beacon if you have the mastery. We will move as a group so those without mastery are protected by the light.
POI.copy-message: 'Take beacon, stack and move as group' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale or Springer.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale or Springer to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Skyscale/Springer up or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BA4IAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Order of Whispers Camp Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale or Springer. Use Mimic to quickly recharge the portal.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale or Springer to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Skyscale/Springer up or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale to follow me, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Skyscale or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Drop a bit down until you reach the Mastery Point.
POI.copy: Drop down a bit, deploy your glider so you don't miss the Mastery Point.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop down, be careful' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Mastery Point for those who don't have it.
POI.copy: Grab Mastery Point for those who don't have it yet.
POI.copy-message: 'Grab Mastery Point' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Drop down a bit, get ready with glider so you don't fall too far.
POI.copy: Drop down again here, get ready with your gliders so you don't fall too far down.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop down, be careful' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Grab the waypoint before moving on.
POI.copy: Make sure you grab [&BIgIAAA=] before moving on.
POI.copy-message: 'Grab waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Skyscale or Springer.
POI.copy: Use Skyscale or Springer to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Skyscale/Springer up or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: TP to [&BIgIAAA=]
POI.copy-message: 'TP to Dragon's Passage Waypoint' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Put a portal here for those without Springer.
POI.copy: Use Springer to get up, or wait here for a portal.
POI.copy-message: 'Springer up or wait for portal' copied to clipboard!

POI.info: Drop down into the water.
POI.copy: Drop down into the water and swim to the bottom.
POI.copy-message: 'Drop down into water' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: Take the Exalted Beacon if you have the mastery. We will move as a group so those without mastery are protected by the light.
POI.copy-message: 'Take beacon, stack and move as group' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: The next Hero Point requires Itzel Poison Lore mastery - if you don't have it you'll take poison damage in the upcoming area and die. You've been warned.
POI.copy-message: 'Poison Lore warning' copied to clipboard!

POI.copy: Take the Exalted Beacon if you have the mastery. We will move as a group so those without mastery are protected by the light.
POI.copy-message: 'Take beacon, stack and move as group' copied to clipboard!
